metadata.title: CVE-2019-8457 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
SQLite3 from 3.6.0 to and including 3.27.2 is vulnerable to heapout-of-bound read in the rtreenode() function when handling invalid rtreetables.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8457` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.1
libsqlite3-0 - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.1
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.1
sqlite3 - 3.22.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

db5.3-sql-util - 5.3.28-13.1ubuntu1.1
db5.3-util - 5.3.28-13.1ubuntu1.1
libdb5.3 - 5.3.28-13.1ubuntu1.1
libdb5.3++ - 5.3.28-13.1ubuntu1.1
libdb5.3-java - 5.3.28-13.1ubuntu1.1
libdb5.3-java-jni - 5.3.28-13.1ubuntu1.1
libdb5.3-sql - 5.3.28-13.1ubuntu1.1
libdb5.3-stl - 5.3.28-13.1ubuntu1.1
libdb5.3-tcl - 5.3.28-13.1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.22.0-1ubuntu0.1').
db5.3 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.3.28-13.1ubuntu1.1').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
sqlcipher package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
